alert.note: Alert for Columbiana (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT COLUMBIANA...MERCER...NORTHWESTERN BEAVER...VENANGO...LAWRENCE...NORTHERN BUTLER...NORTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG...NORTHERN CLARION AND FOREST COUNTIES... At 641 PM EDT, snow showers with reduced visibilities were located along a line extending from near James City to 9 miles east of Dennison. Movement was east at 45 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with these snow showers. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Hermitage, Sharon, Salem, Oil City, Beaver Falls, Grove City, Franklin, Columbiana, East Palestine, Sharpsville, and Marienville. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 95 and 136. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 53. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 30. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions. Rapid changes in visibility may lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow showers pass your location.
